overview: Lonely and bored, newly arrived immigrant Jan journeys out into the night to explore the nightlife of his new city. His dizzying night out quickly spirals out of control as his attempts at meeting strangers repeatedly fall through. Through this misadventure harsh realities begin to reveal themselves about his newfound home.
tagline: A newly arrived immigrant roams the streets of Toronto in search of connection and a long idealized city.
title: Fool's Paradise
